caption: Deploy ERC-20 smart contract
doc: Deploy a ERC-20 token smart contract.

ADL.caption: Name
ADL.doc: The name of this ERC-20 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
ADL.name: name

ADM.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
ADM.doc: The wallet address that will receive the funds when these tokens are sold.
ADM.name: primary_sale_recipient

ADN.caption: Symbol
ADN.doc: The symbol of this ERC-20 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer.
ADN.name: symbol

AIj.caption: Image
AIj.doc: The image of this ERC-20. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
AIj.name: image

AIk.caption: Description
AIk.default_val: This ERC-20 token was deployed using The web3 toolbox created by JackMorgan.xyz
AIk.doc: The description of the ERC-20. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
AIk.name: description
